title: Stagecoach
description: Beneath the weathered canopy of the old road, the Stagecoach rumbles forth, a vital vessel helmed by the Caretaker. It ferries both fresh-faced heroes and crucial supplies to the hamlet's anxious embrace.

title: Tavern
description: A bastion of fleeting respite, the Tavern's creaking doors open to tales of valor and sorrow. It offers solace through mirth and forgetfulness as heroes seek temporary escape from their burdens.

title: Abbey
description: Amid echoing hymns, the Abbey stands as a sanctuary for weary spirits. It welcomes those seeking to unburden their souls through prayer and contemplation, offering tranquility and, occasionally, divine insight.

title: Guild
description: In the Guild's hushed, strategy-laden halls, heroes hone not only their martial prowess but also their chosen methods for combating eldritch horrors.

title: Blacksmith
description: From the Blacksmith's fiery furnace emerges the clanging symphony of hammer on anvil, shaping the might of heroes and fortifying their resolve through masterful craftsmanship.

title: Town Square
description: Overlooked by the imposing statue of the Ancestor, the Town Square serves as the hamlet's pulsing heart, from which all manner of enterprise and governance unfold.

title: Nomad Wagon
description: Laden with relics and oddities from distant lands, the Nomad Wagon offers adventurers the chance to procure artifacts of curious and often mysterious workmanship.

title: Jewelry Stand
description: Under the watchful eye of the Jeweler, this trove eagerly appraises and purchases cosmic fragments, offering relics in trade.

title: Butcher's Circus
description: A travelling spectacle of theatrical sport and gore, the Circus has arrived in the Hamlet. Its Ringmaster eagerly invites participants to test their mettle.

title: Graveyard
description: Beyond the town's edge, the Graveyard sprawls in solemn silence, its weathered headstones standing sentinel over the restless dead. Here, the Caretaker tends to both fresh graves and ancient tombs, his lantern a lone beacon in the encroaching gloom, as he whispers forgotten stories to the silent earth.

title: Ancestor's Statue
description: Looming over the Town Square, this stone colossus stands as an inescapable reminder of the legacy weighing upon the hamlet. Its cold eyes seem to follow those passing beneath its shadow.

title: News Board
description: Plastered with parchments of varying age and import, the News Board serves as the town's informational nexus, where tales of triumph and tragedy compete for attention.

title: Inn
description: A haven of warmth and comfort, the Inn offers weary adventurers momentary respite from lurking horrors. Its rooms whisper with the hopes of those daring to dream of a brighter tomorrow.

title: Brothel
description: Veiled in sweet-scented smoke and hushed promises, the Brothel stands testament to mortal desires, offering fleeting solace to those seeking escape from waking terrors.

title: Gambling Hall
description: In the flickering candlelight, the Gambling Hall echoes with rattling dice and rustling cards. Here, fortunes are won and lost on the cruel wheel of Fate.

title: Sanitarium
description: Behind iron-barred windows, the Sanitarium houses those whose minds have shattered before eldritch horrors. Its halls ring with the echoes of fractured psyches struggling to mend.

title: Treatment Ward
description: A realm of questionable cures and desperate remedies, the Treatment Ward embodies humanity's defiant attempt to reclaim those lost to madness and corruption.

title: Laboratory
description: Amid bubbling concoctions and arcane apparatus, the Laboratory hums with the promise of breakthroughs that could turn the tide against encroaching darkness... or unleash fresh horrors upon the world.

title: Dungeons
description: Beneath cobbled streets, the Dungeons wind through the earth, a labyrinth where the line between justice and cruelty blurs in flickering torchlight.

title: Penance Chamber
description: Within the Abbey's austere walls, the Penance Chamber offers space for reflection and atonement, where the weight of sin is measured against the strength of the soul.

title: Cloister
description: A sanctuary of contemplative silence, the Cloister's serene walkways invite introspection. Its carefully tended gardens contrast starkly with the corruption festering beyond the Abbey's walls.

title: Transept
description: With soaring arches and stained glass windows, the Transept stands testament to faith's enduring power, offering glimpses of divine grace in a world shrouded in darkness.

title: Docks
description: Creaking under weathered planks and salt-crusted ropes, the Docks serve as the hamlet's sole connection to the distant Sunward Isles.

title: Shore
description: Along the mist-shrouded Shore, relentless waves whisper deep secrets. Their rhythmic assault on the land serves as a constant reminder of nature's indifference to mortal struggles.

title: Sewers
description: A labyrinth of filth and forgotten things, the Sewers wind beneath the town. Their putrid waters carry the fervent noises of the brutal Ratfolk.

title: Forest
description: Beyond the town's borders looms the Forest. Its ancient trees, while safer than the depths of the Weald, harbor their own inscrutable dangers.

title: Tent
description: A makeshift haven on the Hamlet's fringes, the Tent houses the enigmatic lone wolf known simply as the Survivalist.

title: Farmlands
description: Stretching from the town's outskirts, the Farmlands stand as a bulwark against starvation. In the distance, corruption grows denser around the ominous old Mill.

title: Perimeter
description: A hastily constructed wooden barrier, the Perimeter marks the tenuous boundary between the hamlet's relative safety and the terrors lurking in the surrounding wilderness.

title: Store
description: Crammed with an eclectic array of goods both mundane and mysterious, the Store serves as a vital resource for adventurers preparing to face the horrors awaiting in the land's darkest corners.

title: Training Grounds
description: Echoing with clashing steel and exertion, the Training Grounds forge raw recruits into hardened warriors, preparing them for the grueling battles that lie ahead.

title: Guild Hall
description: A bastion of strategy and martial knowledge, the Guild Hall stands testament to the power of unity against overwhelming odds. Its walls are adorned with trophies of past triumphs.

title: Dower House
description: Once a symbol of noble lineage, the Dower House now stands as a fading reminder of former glories. The Heirs have claimed the top bedroom as their own upon arriving at the Estate.

title: Kitchen
description: The Dower House kitchen stands open for all, offering a place to quell gnawing hunger or share a moment of normalcy and companionship amid the surrounding chaos.

title: Dining Hall
description: The Dower House dining hall beckons the weary with its derelict yet opulent portraits and candlelit cutlery, a ghostly echo of past grandeur.

title: Town Hall
description: The seat of what passes for governance in these dark times, the Town Hall serves as the focal point for the hamlet's administration, its doors open to those seeking aid or offering solutions.

title: Strategy Room
description: Within these walls, the hamlet's authoritative figures gather to plan the coming month's perilous expeditions, their decisions shaping the fate of many.
